function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Modular construction strategy increasing the spread of COVID-19 infection due to the movement and assembly of prefabricated components from different locations.","Impact":"Increased risk of contagion and transmission of COVID-19 among construction workers and healthcare professionals.","Mitigation":"Implement strict health and safety protocols for construction workers, including regular testing and use of personal protective equipment (PPE).","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps for construction workers, robotic assembly of modular components to reduce human contact.","People":"Construction workers, healthcare professionals, and patients in the healthcare system.","Owner":"Construction companies, healthcare facilities, and government authorities."},{"Description":"Adaptive reuse strategy leading to the potential exposure of workers and healthcare professionals to contaminated materials or surfaces from the existing structures being converted.","Impact":"Risk of exposure to infectious particles during the conversion process, increasing the likelihood of COVID-19 transmission.","Mitigation":"Thorough decontamination of existing structures, use of protective barriers, and implementation of strict hygiene protocols during the conversion process.","Technologies":"UV-C disinfection technology, air purification systems, robotic deconstruction and reconstruction technology.","People":"Construction workers, healthcare professionals, and individuals utilizing the converted facilities.","Owner":"Construction companies, healthcare facilities, and government authorities."}]}
